div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2005 Italy, 1862 (503) Burial: c. 230 B.C. (Crawford) Contents: AE Cosa: 2 Aquinum: a few Aesernia: 2 Cales: many Neapolis: many Suessa: 2 Arpi: a few Roman Rep.: many ROMANO, ROMA issues Disposition: dispersed Sambon, Recherches, p. 33 Thomsen, ERC I, p. 120 Crawford, RRCH 28
